title: Ticket #3383: Blahp requires HOME to be set in the environment
description: The blahp depends on HOME being set correctly in its environment in order to perform some operations. In particular, proxy renewal will fail if HOME is unset.
remarks:
2012-Dec-14 12:57:47 by bbockelm:
As a site which threw a party when we finally got rid of home directories for grid users, I'd be awfully glad if the fix for this bug allowed the site admin to have gridmanager set HOME to be in a directory under Condor's control.

For example, if we set:

BLAH_HOME=$(SPOOL)/blah_home/

then the HOME env var would be $(SPOOL)/blah_home/$(LOGNAME) for blahp.

2012-Dec-14 15:02:33 by jfrey:
That sounds like a feasible feature. I'll commit a fix now that assumes the job owner has a home directory. Then we can consider the additional change.
